00026 #pragma once
00027 
00028 #include <l4/sys/factory.h>
00029 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00030 
00031 namespace L4 {
00032 
00041 class Factory : public Kobject_t<Factory, Kobject, L4_PROTO_FACTORY>
00042 {
00043   L4_KOBJECT(Factory)
00044 
00045 public:
00046 
00047   typedef l4_mword_t Proto;
00048 
00053   struct Nil {};
00054 
00061   struct Lstr
00062   {
00066     char const *s;
00067 
00071     int len;
00072 
00073     Lstr(char const *s, int len) : s(s), len(len) {}
00074   };
00075 
00082   class S
00083   {
00084   private:
00085     l4_utcb_t *u;
00086     l4_msgtag_t t;
00087     l4_cap_idx_t f;
00088 
00089   public:
00093     S(S const &o)
00094     : u(o.u), t(o.t), f(o.f)
00095     { const_cast<S&>(o).t.raw = 0; }
00096 
00105     S(l4_cap_idx_t f, long obj, L4::Cap<L4::Kobject> target,
00106       l4_utcb_t *utcb) throw()
00107     : u(utcb), t(l4_factory_create_start_u(obj, target.cap(), u)), f(f)
00108     {}
00109 
00114     ~S()
00115     {
00116       if (t.raw)
00117   l4_factory_create_commit_u(f, t, u);
00118     }
00119 
00124     operator l4_msgtag_t ()
00125     {
00126       l4_msgtag_t r = l4_factory_create_commit_u(f, t, u);
00127       t.raw = 0;
00128       return r;
00129     }
00130 
00135     S &operator  << (l4_mword_t i)
00136     {
00137       l4_factory_create_add_int_u(i, &t, u);
00138       return *this;
00139     }
00140 
00145     S &operator  << (l4_umword_t i)
00146     {
00147       l4_factory_create_add_uint_u(i, &t, u);
00148       return *this;
00149     }
00150 
00155     S &operator << (char const *s)
00156     {
00157       l4_factory_create_add_str_u(s, &t, u);
00158       return *this;
00159     }
00160 
00165     S &operator << (Lstr const &s)
00166     {
00167       l4_factory_create_add_lstr_u(s.s, s.len, &t, u);
00168       return *this;
00169     }
00170 
00174     S &operator << (Nil)
00175     {
00176       l4_factory_create_add_nil_u(&t, u);
00177       return *this;
00178     }
00179 
00184     S &operator << (l4_fpage_t d)
00185     {
00186       l4_factory_create_add_fpage_u(d, &t, u);
00187       return *this;
00188     }
00189   };
00190 
00191 
00192 public:
00193 
00213   S create(Cap<Kobject> target, long obj, l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00214   {
00215     return S(cap(), obj, target, utcb);
00216   }
00217 
00222   l4_msgtag_t create_task(Cap<Task> const & target_cap,
00223                           l4_fpage_t const &utcb_area,
00224                           l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00225   { return l4_factory_create_task_u(cap(), target_cap.cap(), utcb_area, utcb); }
00226 
00231   l4_msgtag_t create_thread(Cap<Thread> const &target_cap,
00232                             l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00233   { return l4_factory_create_thread_u(cap(), target_cap.cap(), utcb); }
00234 
00239   l4_msgtag_t create_factory(Cap<Factory> const &target_cap,
00240                              unsigned long limit,
00241                              l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00242   { return l4_factory_create_factory_u(cap(), target_cap.cap(), limit, utcb); }
00243 
00248   l4_msgtag_t create_gate(Cap<Kobject> const &target_cap,
00249                           Cap<Thread> const &thread_cap, l4_umword_t label,
00250                           l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00251   { return l4_factory_create_gate_u(cap(), target_cap.cap(), thread_cap.cap(), label, utcb); }
00252 
00257   l4_msgtag_t create_semaphore(Cap<K_semaphore> const &target_cap,
00258                                l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00259   { return l4_factory_create_semaphore_u(cap(), target_cap.cap(), utcb); }
00260 
00265   l4_msgtag_t create_irq(Cap<Irq>const &target_cap,
00266                          l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00267   { return l4_factory_create_irq_u(cap(), target_cap.cap(), utcb); }
00268 
00273   l4_msgtag_t create_vm(Cap<Vm>const &target_cap,
00274                         l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00275   { return l4_factory_create_vm_u(cap(), target_cap.cap(), utcb); }
00276 };
00277 
00278 }
